attributes.additional_details: Car tax discs are no longer issued. The state lost £93 million in the first year as untaxed cars are being used unchecked on the road. Meanwhile, some law-abiding citizens are being caught and fined because they don’t realise, no longer possessing a paper disc, that their old licence has expired.
attributes.background: Re-introducing the disc will gain the state revenue and stop law abiding people being fined.
